en.question: What were the religious beliefs or worldview of Sigmund Freud?
en.answer: Sigmund Freud was an Austrian neurologist and the founder of psychoanalysis, a clinical method for treating psychopathology through dialogue between a patient and a psychoanalyst. He is often considered the father of psychoanalysis and is known for his theories on the unconscious mind and the interpretation of dreams. Freud's views on religion were complex and evolving throughout his life. He was raised in a Jewish family but did not practice religion as an adult. He criticized religious beliefs as illusions that serve to comfort people in their struggle for existence. However, he also saw some similarities between religious and psychoanalytic concepts, such as the idea of a superego as a moral conscience. Freud's ideas were influential in the development of existentialist and humanistic psychology, as well as in various religious and spiritual movements.

fr.question: Quelle était la religion ou la conception du monde de Sigmund Freud ?
fr.answer: Sigmund Freud était un psychiatre et un théoricien de la psychanalyse. Sa théorie propose que l'humanité est composée de deux systèmes mentaux inconscients : le système conscience et le système inconscient. Il a développé la théorie de la structure freudienne de l'esprit, divisée en id, égo et super-égo. Freud a également proposé la théorie du développement psychosexual et de la sexualité infantile. Il n'avait pas de religion particulière.

es.question: ¿Cuál era la religión de Sigmund Freud?
es.answer: Sigmund Freud was Jewish and identified as a non-religious Jew. He did not publicly affiliate with any organized religion.

ru.question: Какова была религия или мировоззрение Зигмунд Фрейд?
ru.answer: Зигмунд Фрейд был еврейского происхождения и развил теорию психоанализа, которая не является религией, а представляет собой теорию о психическом развитии и метод лечения психических расстройств. Он описал человеческое сознание как состоящее из несознательного и сознательного, и разработал понятия либидо, эго, и я. Его мировоззрение можно охарактеризовать как скептицизм по отношению к религии и духовности, хотя он также исследовал вопросы религиозного символизма и образов в психоанализе.

pt.question: Qual era a religião de Sigmund Freud?

ru.question: Кто является супругой Зигмунд Фрейд?
ru.answer: Мария Анна Фройд (Martha Bernays, later known as Martha Freud) was the first wife of Sigmund Freud. They married in 1886 and had six children together. They divorced in 1924. Anna Freud, their youngest daughter, became a renowned psychoanalyst in her own right. Isaac Newton was a physicist, mathematician, scientist, developer of calculus, geometry and mathematical analysis, and a scholar of mathematics, optics, and astronomy. He made significant contributions to the laws of motion, universal gravitation, and the nature and properties of light. He is widely recognized as one of the most influential scientists of all time.

zh.question: 艾萨克·牛顿信奉的是什么？
zh.answer: 艾萨克·牛顿信奉神皇家，英国王家，以及科学和理性思想。

en.question: What were the religious beliefs or worldview of Isaac Newton?
en.answer: Isaac Newton was a Christian, specifically he was a member of the Church of England. He wrote extensively on biblical prophecy and alchemy, but his religious beliefs did not significantly influence his scientific work. He believed in a deterministic universe governed by laws of physics that he discovered.

fr.question: Quelle était la religion ou la conception du monde de Isaac Newton ?
fr.answer: Isaac Newton était chrétien et il a développé une conception du monde mécaniste, où il croit que l'univers fonctionne selon des lois mathématiques immuables et impersonnelles établies par Dieu. Il a également écrit sur l'alchimie et l'occultisme, mais ces idées ne sont pas considérées comme faisant partie de sa conception du monde scientifique.

es.question: ¿Cuál era la religión de Isaac Newton?
es.answer:
Isaac Newton fue bautizado en la Iglesia de Anglicana. Sin embargo, no se sabe con certeza que creía en el dogma cristiano ortodoxo, y se le ha descrito a menudo como un deísta. No obstante, no hay evidencia de que practicara una religión específica.  

(Isaac Newton was baptized in the Church of England. However, it is not known for certain that he believed in the orthodox Christian dogma, and he is often described as a deist. There is no evidence that he practiced a specific religion.)

ru.question: Какова была религия или мировоззрение Исаак Нютон?
ru.answer:
Исаак Нютон был англиканцем и имел деistiйственно-религиозные взгляды. Он был активным членом англиканской церкви, а также интересовался алхимией и теософией. Он также писал многое по теме религиозной философии.

(Note: Исаак Нютон был англиканцем и имел деистические взгляды. He was an active member of the Church of England and was also interested in alchemy and theosophy. He wrote a lot on religious philosophy.)

ja.question: アイザック・ニュートンさんの宗教信仰は何ですか？
ja.answer:
アイザック・ニュートンは、基督教の信徒であり、ангリチャーン教徒です。

Isaac Newton was a Christian, specifically an Anglican.

it.question: Qual era la religione di Isaac Newton?
it.answer:
Isaac Newton era anglicano.  
(Note: Isaac Newton fu battezzato anglicano e credeva nella religione cristiana anglicana.)

de.question: Welche Religion oder Weltanschauung hatte Isaac Newton?
de.answer: Isaac Newton war christlich und vertrat eine syncretistische Weltanschauung, die Elemente der christlichen Theologie mit Elementen der alchemistischen und hermetischen Lehren verband. Er schrieb auch ein Buch über alchemistische Themen.

pt.question: Qual era a religião de Isaac Newton?
pt.answer: Isaac Newton era cristão. Ele foi batizado na Igreja Anglicana. No entanto, ele era conhecido por sua privacidade sobre suas crenças religiosas e é considerado que tenha tido uma crença religiosa profunda e pessoal.

ko.question: 아이작 뉴턴이 신앙하던 종교는 어떤 것인가요?
ko.answer:
아이작 뉴턴은 공주의 교와 덴마크 교의 북방주의  anglicanism and deism의 가르씨였습니다.  

(Note: I assume you meant Isaac Newton, and I provided the answer in English because the question was asked in English.)

el.question: Ποια ήταν η θρησκεία του Ισαάκ Νεύτων;
el.answer: Ισαάκ Νεύτον ήταν εκκλησιαστής της Εκκλησίας της Ενότητας της Ελλάδας, ενδιαφέροντος από τη Βαθική Αγγλική Τρίαδα, συντάθηκε με τη Βιβλική Γραμματική Τρίαδα. Αυτός είναι κNOWN για την σύγγραφη της "Πρόσθετα της Μεταφύσεως" και της "Αλχηβιαδίκης Λύσης" των λογισμών της Γεωργίου Βειτζεμπούλλ. Αυτός είναι ένας επιστήμονας στην λογική και τη φιλοσοφία. Η Θρησκεία του Ισαάκ Νεύτον είναι πιο σημαντική στην ιστορία της επιστήμης και της φιλοσοφίας από το 17ο αιώνα.

nl.question: Wat was de religie of het wereldbeeld van Isaac Newton?
nl.answer: Isaac Newton was een Anglican Christian. His scientific work did not significantly impact his religious beliefs, which were typical of the Church of England during that time. el.question: Ποια είναι η απασχόληση της Άλμπερτ Αϊνστάιν;
el.answer: Albert Einstein was a theoretical physicist, known for developing the theory of general relativity, one of the two pillars of modern physics. He is also known for his mass–energy equivalence formula E = mc², which has been dubbed "the world's most famous equation". He received the 1921 Nobel Prize in Physics "for his services to theoretical physics, and especially for his discovery of the law of the photoelectric effect", a key pillar of quantum theory.

zh.question: 阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦信奉的是什么？
zh.answer: 阿特兰大大教堂的路德主教, 洛杉矶大教堂的天主教主教, 德国лютеран教会的教皇, 德国哲学家, 诗人, 爱因斯坦信奉的信仰是基督教, 但他不是官方教皇或主教, 他的思想被归类为现代主义和existentialism.

en.question: What were the religious beliefs or worldview of Albert Einstein?
en.answer: Albert Einstein was an agnostic. He did not believe in a personal God or organized religion. He was known to have expressed a preference for a deistic belief in a creator, but not a personal deity involved in human affairs. He also believed in the importance of science and reason in understanding the natural world.

fr.question: Quelle était la religion ou la conception du monde de Albert Einstein ?
fr.answer: Albert Einstein était agnostique ou athée. Il n'avait pas de religion et n'avait pas de conception du monde religieuse particulière.

es.question: ¿Cuál era la religión de Albert Einstein?
es.answer: Albert Einstein was Jewish and identified as agnostic. He did not have a formal religious affiliation.

ru.question: Какова была религия или мировоззрение Алберт Эйнштейн?
ru.answer: Алберт Эйнштейн был деистом, то есть неверующим в бога, но он был интересован восточными религиями и философией, особенно буддизмом и индуизмом, и он иногда выражал сомнения в своей деистической позиции. Он также говорил, что наука и религия несовместимы, но это не означает, что он отрицал роль религии в жизни людей. В своей известной речи "Сcience, Philosophy and Religion" Эйнштейн сказал: "Само по себе наука не может ничего сказать о Боге, но если мы понимаем Бога по-научному, то это не будет Богом, который понимаем по религиозным текстам."

ja.question: アルベルト・アインシュタインさんの宗教信仰は何ですか？

(Albert Einstein was Jewish.)

it.question: Qual era la religione di Albert Einstein?
it.answer: Albert Einstein was Jewish and identified as agnostic. He did not affiliate with any particular religion.

de.question: Welche Religion oder Weltanschauung hatte Albert Einstein?
de.answer: Albert Einstein war agnostisch. Er beschrieb sich selbst als "nicht religiös". Er sagte: "Ich bin kein Atheist. Ich habe keine Angriffsweise gegen Gott, aber ich habe keinen Glauben an Gott, für mich ist er völlig unbegründet."

pt.question: Qual era a religião de Albert Einstein?
pt.answer: Albert Einstein was Jewish and considered himself an agnostic. He wrote, "I have repeatedly said that in my opinion the important thing is to enhance the value that already exists, and what is dearest to me and most necessary for my own happiness is friendship and human understanding." He also said, "I cannot conceive of a God who rewards and punishes his creatures, or has a will similar to that of man." (source: Albert Einstein: The Human Side, by Helen Dukas and Banaime Pais)
